functionalGroupsRules.description: Functional groups ordered by priority (lower priority number = higher priority in naming)

substituentPatterns.description: Common substituent patterns for prefix generation

chainSelectionRules.description: Rules for selecting the principal chain (in priority order)

rules.name: principal functional group
rules.description: Chain must contain the principal functional group

rules.name: longest carbon chain
rules.description: If multiple chains available, select the one with most carbon atoms

rules.name: most substituents
rules.description: Chain with the most substituent branches

rules.name: best numbering
rules.description: Chain that gives lowest locants to substituents

numberingRules.description: Rules for numbering the principal chain (in priority order)

rules.name: functional group at lowest position
rules.description: Principal functional group gets lowest numbered position

rules.name: locant sum
rules.description: Use numbering that gives lowest sum of locant positions

rules.name: first difference rule
rules.description: Compare locant sequences from both ends, choose numbering with lowest number at first difference

vowelElisionRules.description: Rules for vowel elision when combining name parts

rules.description: Drop 'a' or 'e' from end of alkane stem before suffix starting with vowel
Keep 'a' in certain cases like 'methanal' and 'ethanal'
